data.author: World Champ Tech

changelog.release_notes:
What's new in this version:

1. Bike+ now works over Bluetooth LE - you can now launch the app, and toggle recordings all without ever opening the companion iPhone app.
2. A fresh, revised interface for Pebble Time Round
3. Updates for the Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel Classic for Pebble 3.8.

What's new in this version:

1. Fixes bug that could crash app when tagging location.
2. Additional memory and performance improvements.

What's new in this version:

1. Fix for bug that could crash app on Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel.
2. Memory usage improvements.

What's new in this release: 

1. Updated for Pebble Time with color maps! 
2. Improved app efficiency with 15% better battery life Pebble Time!

What's new in this release:

1. Added support for 24h time.

What's new in this version:

1. Improved reliability of connection to iPhone.

What's new in this version:

1. Bike+ users can now get road hazard alerts in the app as they ride!
2. Completely updated for version 2.5 firmware with many bug fixes and significant improvement in memory usage for better app performance.

What's new in this version: 
1. Added data screen with Pebble battery and iPhone battery levels. 
2. Added data screen with temperature, wind speed, and wind direction. 
3. Performance enhancements.

What's new in this version: 

1. Updated build for 2.1.1 firmware.

What's new in this version:

1. Many bug fixes! Fixed ping bug. Fixed text flicker bug. Fixed an issue that caused infrequent crashes.

2. Get maps on your Pebble! Maps available during initial two month demo period, or by purchasing a Bike+ Fit subscription.

What's new in this version:

1. Bug fixes

data.description:
Bike+ is the only cycling app developed by World Champion Athletes!

Bike+ integrates seamlessly with the Bike+ iOS App to display ride time, speed, distance, altitude, grade, total climbing , and more. Users can start and stop ride recordings, toggle segment timers, and tag hazard locations all from the convenience of your wrist.

What's new in this version:

data.title: Bike+
